name: 普里亚·拉姆斯巴班
name_full: 普里亚·拉姆斯巴班 Priya Ramasubban
introduction: Priya Ramasubban has over a decade of experience directing, producing, writing and developing programs for media outlets including National Geographic Channel, Discovery Channel, History Channel and PBS. She brings a rare combination of passionate/creative storytelling along with strong logistics/problem solving skills that are always useful on tough productions. She has shot in 29 countries ranging from Argentina to Zimbabwe. Her work in all these countries has allowed her to hone and tailor her content for diverse audiences. She is currently working on her first indie feature film titled 'Chuskit' set in Ladakh, India.In her other avatar she is an activist working towards sustainable rejuvenation of lakes in Bangalore, India.
